Roasted Chicken

Ingredients:

  • 1 whole chicken (3-4 pounds)
  • Salt and pepper
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil or melted butter
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced (optional)
  • 1 lemon, quartered (optional)
  • Fresh herbs such as rosemary, thyme, or sage (optional)

Procedure:

  1. Preheat the oven to 425째F (218째C).
  2. Remove the giblets and neck from the chicken, if included. Rinse the chicken inside and out with cold water and pat it dry with paper towels.
  3. Season the chicken generously with salt and pepper, including the cavity. If desired, stuff the cavity with lemon quarters and fresh herbs.
  4. Tie the legs together with kitchen twine and tuck the wings under the body of the chicken.
  5. Place the chicken in a roasting pan or a cast iron skillet.
  6. If desired, mix the olive oil or melted butter with minced garlic and brush it all over the chicken.
  7. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until the internal temperature of the thickest part of the chicken reaches 165째F (74째C) when measured with a meat thermometer.
  8. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for 10-15 minutes before carving.
  9. Serve and enjoy!
